section.title: inserter< T > Struct Template Reference

para.para: Helper class for suppressing move-construction in single-argument array constructors.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Helper class for suppressing move-construction in single-argument array constructors.

\detail \cpp // desired result: [ [ 42 ] ] auto bad = toml::array{ toml::array{ 42 } }; auto good = toml::array{ toml::inserter{ toml::array{ 42 } } }; std::cout << "bad: " << bad << "\n"; std::cout << "good:" << good << "\n"; \ecpp \out bad: [ 42 ] good: [ [ 42 ] ] \eout
